1.text: Line a plate or an airtight container with paper towels.

2.text: Stack the pizza on the plate with more paper towels between each layer.

3.text: Cover the plate in plastic wrap or put the lid on the container.

4.text: Place the pizza in the fridge if you plan to eat it within 3-5 days.

5.text: Store your pizza in the freezer to keep it fresh for up to 6 months.

6.text: Heat the pizza in the oven to get a crispy crust.

7.text: Use your toaster oven for a quick way to heat up 1-2 slices.

8.text: Try heating your pizza in a skillet for the best texture.

9.text: Reheat the pizza in the microwave for the fastest approach.
